item.description:
Think only professional lobbyists can lobby? Think again! The Humane Society of the United States invites you to participate in the Maine Humane Lobby Day in Augusta to make a tremendous difference for animals.

This is an exciting opportunity to meet directly with your elected officials or their staff about legislation that will significantly impact animals. There will be a briefing on tips for lobbying and an overview of pending animal legislation which will prepare you to meet your elected officials and advocate for animals. R.S.V.P. today to lend your voice for animals and make a difference in Maine.

Click here for more information and to RSVP
https://community.hsu...

group.name: The Maine Animal Welfare Meetup Group

item.name: Maine Humane Lobby Day 2009
